title: Kilimnikus
author: Kilimnikus
content: What is good about trading? It’s like a pearl that is laying on a road in the dust. It’s a hidden possibility to become rich. What is good about AI? It’s like an infravisor, that can see those frequencies of the light, which human eye cannot see. A technology applied to a human desire. The NeuSa service does exactly that. NeuSa stands for “neuron sages”, AI trading bots that user can teach and use to trade. The bot sees in the OHLCV sequences a hidden logic, invisible frequencies which a human being cannot see or understand. Try this new level of trading at neusa.io
